General.Name: URA Holdings PLC
General.Description: URA Holdings Plc operates as a mining exploration and development company. It primarily explores for graphite, coltan, lithium, niobium, tantalum, beryllium, rubidium, and rare earth elements. The company holds interests in the two exploration licenses covering an area of 1,284 square kilometers located in the Republic of Zambia. It also holds interests in the Gravelotte Emerald Mine project  located in South Africa. URA Holdings Plc was incorporated in 2005 and is based in London, the United Kingdom.
